ModMetaData.name: BetterHemogenFarmContinued
ModMetaData.author: pewpewlord420
ModMetaData.description:
The mod adds a Gizmo to any Pawn (be they Colonist, Slave, or Prisoner), which allows you to flag them to automatically extract hemogen.
This allows you to select a different Prisoner Interaction Mode, and enjoy the benefits of both.
This is an updated version of Maarx's mod: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2967718207. I claim no ownership of this mod. This version may be taken down by request from the original author.
- Compatibility with version 1.5. - A setting to ignore rest conditions.
